Trade/Device Name(s): i-STAT Hematocrit test with i-STAT Alinity System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for i-STAT Hematocrit test with i-STAT Alinity System for quantitative hematocrit measurement using a handheld point-of-care analyzer.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro quantification of packed red blood cell volume fraction in arterial or venous heparinized or non-anticoagulated whole blood (not evaluated in neonates or with capillary samples); aids determination and monitoring of total red cell volume status associated with anemia and erythrocytosis.
